thread.section_title: Reuters: Financial Services and Real Estate
thread.title: UK PM May says will need collaborative framework to oversee financial services

title: UK PM May says will need collaborative framework to oversee financial services
text: March 2, 2018 / 2:29 PM / in 6 minutes UK PM May says will need collaborative framework to oversee financial services Reuters Staff 1 Min Read LONDON, March 2 (Reuters) - British Prime Minister said on Friday that financial services should be part of a new deep and special partnership with the European Union after Britain leaves the bloc. In a speech in London, May said there would need to be a collaborative, objective framework to oversee financial services after Brexit. (Reporting by Alastair Smout and Andrew MacAskill, writing by Michael Holden; editing by Guy Faulconbridge)
